name: equsalvw
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: bitri(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), w1, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), w1)
-| wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1)), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), w1)
-| wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1)), w1)

stmt.origin: albii(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1)))
-| wb(wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), w1)
-| wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1)), w1)
-| wb(wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), w1)
-| wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1)), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1)), w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Version of ~ equsalv with a disjoint variable condition, and of ~ equsal with two disjoint variable conditions, which requires fewer axioms. See also the dual form ~ equsexvw . (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.)
